column4: Hi. I have my root partition as reiserfx, every time I boot I get a fsck error. it comes down to: fsck died with exit status 9. i can crtl d and ubuntu starts up fine, how can I get rid of this error?
isotropic: have you got medibuntu repository enabled?
do a google search for medibuntu and add it
i don't know, how would i check that?
